articles.title: Canada regulator plans looser bank rules to boost business loans
articles.body: Canadas banking regulator is proposing to ease capital rules for certain corporate and real estate loans, aiming to fuel more business investment in the country. THIS CONTENT IS RESERVED FOR SUBSCRI 3750 chars

articles.title: Former Fed governors stock trades violated the central banks ethics rules
articles.body: A former Federal Reserve governor who retired in August listed several stock trades in her financial disclosure documents for 2024 that violated the central banks ethics rules. The transactions are outlined in a report released Saturday by the U.S. Office of Government Ethics, which reviewed Adriana Kuglers financial disclosures after the Fed referred them to its inspector general earlier this year. Kugler, who unexpectedly stepped down from the Fed board Aug. 8, disclosed more than a dozen individual stock trades, including several made during financial trading blackout periods around the time the Federal Reserves policymaking committee meets to set interest rates and other monetary policy.

articles.title: AI Weekly Mega deals and Molire-inspired plays
articles.body: STORY From multi-billion dollar deals, to plays written with AI -- this is AI Weekly. -- AI WeeklyMicrosoft and Nvidia have made a mega deal with Claude-maker Anthropic, featuring tens of billions of dollars of spending.It includes a $30 billion commitment by the AI company to Microsofts cloud services, Azure. And both Nvidia and Microsoft committing up to $10 billion and $5 billion in Anthropic, respectively. The agreement brings together major players in the AI industry, with Claude being a major rival to ChatGPT.Elon Musks artificial-intelligence startup xAI is in advanced talks to raise $15 billion in new equity - at a valuation of $230 billion.that is according to the Wall Street Journal. The new valuation would more than double the amount disclosed in March.The startup has been rapidly scaling its data-center footprint to train more advanced models, as it tries to close the gap with OpenAIs ChatGPT and Anthropics Claude. Bank of America is planning to spend $4 billion more in new technology, including AI, to boost bankers productivity and drive revenue growth.The banks chief technology officer said its 18,000 developers have used AI agents for the past year, with significant gains in productivity.The second-biggest U.S. lender sends AI-generated market information to its financial advisers, combined with data on clients portfolios, so that bankers can better tailor their investment advice.Nvidias move to use smartphone-style memory chips in its AI servers could cause server-memory prices to double by late 2026.that is according to a report published Wednesday by Counterpoint Research.Electronics supply chains worldwide have been hit by a shortage of legacy memory chips in the last two months.Manufacturers have turned their focus to high-end memory chips suited to semiconductors.Counterpoint says Nvidias decision to reduce AI server power costs, by changing the kind of memory chip it uses, could create sudden demand that the industry is not prepared for. Sorbonne Universite Theatre Moliere SorbonneAnd, scholars have teamed up with an AI collective in Paris to create a new play written in the style of the famous 17th-century playwright Moliere.Over the last three years, the team has trained the French-developed Mistral AI on Molieres works, personal library texts, and historical documents to replicate his language and humor.A production called The Astrologer or the False Omens is set to debut at the Chateau de Versailles in May 2026.

And both Nvidia and Microsoft committing up to $10 billion and $5 billion in Anthropic, respectively. The agreement brings together major players in the AI industry, with Claude being a major rival to ChatGPT.Elon Musks artificial-intelligence startup xAI is in advanced talks to raise $15 billion in new equity - at a valuation of $230 billion.that is according to the Wall Street Journal. The new valuation would more than double the amount disclosed in March.The startup has been rapidly scaling its data-center footprint to train more advanced models, as it tries to close the gap with OpenAIs ChatGPT and Anthropics Claude. Bank of America is planning to spend $4 billion more in new technology, including AI, to boost bankers productivity and drive revenue growth.The banks chief technology officer said its 18,000 developers have used AI agents for the past year, with significant gains in productivity.The second-biggest U.S. lender sends AI-generated market information to its financial advisers, combined with data on clients portfolios, so that bankers can better tailor their investment advice.Nvidias move to use smartphone-style memory chips in its AI servers could cause server-memory prices to double by late 2026.that is according to a report published Wednesday by Counterpoint Research.Electronics supply chains worldwide have been hit by a shortage of legacy memory chips in the last two months.Manufacturers have turned their focus to high-end memory chips suited to semiconductors.Counterpoint says Nvidias decision to reduce AI server power costs, by changing the kind of memory chip it uses, could create sudden demand that the industry is not prepared for. Sorbonne Universite Theatre Moliere SorbonneAnd, scholars have teamed up with an AI collective in Paris to create a new play written in the style of the famous 17th-century playwright Moliere.Over the last three years, the team has trained the French-developed Mistral AI on Molieres works, personal library texts, and historical documents to replicate his language and humor.A production called The Astrologer or the False Omens is set to debut at the Chateau de Versailles in May 2026.

articles.title: TD Bank Launches Amazon Shop with Points in the U.S., Expanding Rewards Benefits Ahead of Holiday Season
articles.body: MOUNT LAUREL, N.J., November 19, 2025--TD Bank, Americas Most Convenient Bank, now offers Amazon Shop with Points in the U.S. for TD credit cardholders, effective today. This feature allows TD cardholders to redeem their points instantly at checkout on Amazon.com, empowering consumers to turn everyday purchases into meaningful and easily redeemed rewards.
articles.raw_text: TD Bank Launches Amazon Shop with Points in the U.S., Expanding Rewards Benefits Ahead of Holiday Season. MOUNT LAUREL, N.J., November 19, 2025--TD Bank, Americas Most Convenient Bank, now offers Amazon Shop with Points in the U.S. for TD credit cardholders, effective today. This feature allows TD cardholders to redeem their points instantly at checkout on Amazon.com, empowering consumers to turn everyday purchases into meaningful and easily redeemed rewards.
